item.title: 10 Movie Twists That Were Designed To Devastate You
item.description: From Atonement to Buried, cinema's most desolating narrative curveballs have an innate knack for reducing their audiences to emotional wrecks.

item.title: 10 Most Powerful Original X-Men Movie Characters, Ranked By Threat Level
item.description: The original X-Men movie in 2000 introduced a lot of the mutants audiences know and love, but not all of them are handled equally in terms of power.
